item.title: End NV-140 East at US-95
item.description: End NV-140 East at US-95. Use US-95 north for McDermitt; US-95 south for Winnemucca.

item.title: End NV-140 East at US-95
item.description: End NV-140 at US-95 in Humboldt County.

item.title: NV-140 - Mile 1
item.description: NV-140 - Mile 1 in Humboldt (HU) County

item.title: US-95 North at NV-140 West
item.description: US-95 north at NV-140 west to Denio and Lakeview (Oregon). Continue north on US-95 for McDermitt (Nevada-Oregon State Line) and Boise (Idaho).

item.title: US-95 North at NV-140 West
item.description: US-95 north at NV-140 west to Denio and Lakeview (Oregon). Continue north on US-95 for McDermitt (Nevada-Oregon State Line) and Boise (Idaho).

item.title: US-95 North at NV-140 West
item.description: Junction NV-140 on US-95 north in Humboldt County.

item.title: NV-140 East at NV-292 - Denio Junction
item.description: NV-140 east at NV-292 in Denio Junction. Turn left on NV-292 north for Denio. Turn right to continue east on NV-140 for Winnemucca.

item.title: NV-140 East at NV-292 - Denio Junction
item.description: NV-140 east at NV-292. Turn right to continue east on NV-140.

item.title: NV-140 East - Sheldon National Wildlife Refuge Jct.
item.description: NV-140 east at junction to Sheldon National Wildlife Refuge and Cedarville (California). Continue east on NV-140 for Denio and Winnemucca.

item.title: NV-140 East - Sage Hen Hills Summit
item.description: NV-140 east -Sage Hen Hills Summit - Elevation 6,349 Feet.

item.title: NV-140 East - Humboldt County
item.description: NV-140 east in Humboldt County. This is the first shield on NV-140 east in Nevada.

item.title: NV-140 East - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada on NV-140 east. Taken at the Oregon-Nevada state line.

item.title: End NV-8A at NV-140
item.description: End NV-8A at NV-140. NV-140 west to Adel and Lakeview; east to Denio and Winnemucca.

item.title: End NV-140 East at US-95
item.description: End NV-140 at US-95

item.title: Jct. NV-140 on NV-292 South
item.description: NV-292 south approaching NV-140

item.title: NV-140 East at NV-292
item.description: NV-140 east at NV-292 jct.

item.title: NV-292 South at NV-140
item.description: End NV-292 at NV-140 to Cedarville, Lakeview, and Winnemucca

item.title: NV-292 South at NV-140
item.description: End NV-292 at NV-140

item.title: US-95 North at NV-140
item.description: US-95 north to McDermitt and Boise at NV-140 west to Denio and Lakeview.

item.title: US-95 North at NV-140 West
item.description: Junction NV-140 on US-95 North

item.title: US-95 South at NV-140
item.description: US-95 south at NV-140. This Nevada state route shield does not contain the word "Nevada."
